Title: S5 Ep. 228 Mariam Nusrat
Description:
Mariam Nusrat is a bit of an Einstein in female form.  As a Senior Education Specialist at the World Bank (currently on extended leave): 12+ years of supporting education projects globally.  She reimagined how to make games accessible to the masses. 

She built Breshna.io, a platform that empowers users to create, share and monetize their own purposeful #Web3 video games, with no code and at lightning speed. Think #Tiktok for video games. Tune in to hear more of her thoughts about the Future of Games. 

The Intern Whisperer Podcast is brought to you by Employers 4 Change - Increasing diversity through #Skills based #DiversityEquityInclusion #recruitment and #management for #interns and #employees alike. Sign up to be an #Employer4Change that invests in #intern #talent and #employees.
